effect_entries.short_effect: Teaches Torment to a compatible Pokémon. (Gen II: ThunderPunch Gen I: Softboiled)
effect_entries.effect: Teaches Torment to a compatible Pokémon.

flavor_text_entries.text:
相手に　いちゃもんを　つけて
同じ　技を　２回　連続で
だせなくする。

The user torments and enrages the
target, making it incapable of using
the same move twice in a row.

Chi la usa tormenta e fa infuriare il nemico,
impedendogli di usare la stessa mossa
due volte di seguito.

Arroja al objetivo por los aires y lo estrella contra
el suelo en el siguiente turno, impidiéndole
moverse en el aire.

Der Anwender bringt das Ziel in Rage.
Dieses ist nicht mehr in der Lage, eine
Attacke zweimal hintereinander anzuwenden.

Le lanceur irrite l’ennemi pour l’empêcher
d’utiliser la même capacité deux fois de suite.

트집을 잡아서 똑같은 기술을
연속으로 쓸 수 없게 한다.

いちゃもんを　つけて　おなじわざを
れんぞくで　だせない　ようにする。

The user torments and enrages the
target, making it incapable of using the
same move twice in a row.

The user torments and enrages the
target, making it incapable of using the
same move twice in a row.

Le lanceur irrite l’ennemi pour
l’empêcher d’utiliser la même
capacité 2 fois de suite.

The user torments and enrages the
foe, making it incapable of using the
same move twice in a row.

The user torments and enrages the
foe, making it incapable of using the
same move twice in a row.

The user torments and enrages the
foe, making it incapable of using the
same move twice in a row.

It enrages the foe,
making it incapable
of using the same
move successively.

Prevents the foe
from using the same
move in a row.

Prevents the foe
from using the same
move in a row.
